an1.71:1: "Bhikkhus, I do not see even a single thing that so causes unarisen wholesome qualities to arise and arisen unwholesome qualities to decline as good friendship. For one with good friends, unarisen wholesome qualities arise and arisen unwholesome qualities decline."[n.57] On the importance of good friendship(kalyāṇamittatā)in the spiritual life, seeSN9.3. See tooSN45.2
